banner_description: Experience professional and relaxing home massage services.

services.title: Services
services.description: We offer professional home massage service packages.

list.title: Full Body Massage
list.description: Full body massage therapy helps reduce stress, improve circulation, and provide deep relaxation.

list.title: Hot Stone Massage
list.description: Hot stones help soothe tense muscles, improve circulation, and bring deep relaxation.

list.title: Aromatherapy Massage
list.description: Natural essential oils are used to calm the mind, relieve stress, and promote deep relaxation.

prices.title: Service Pricing
prices.description: Flexible service packages with guaranteed quality at the most reasonable cost.

list.name: Premium Package
list.note: Includes advanced massage services using natural oils and relaxing essential oils.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a professional team with years of experience in home massage services. We are committed to providing you with the best relaxation and health recovery experience.
about.mission: Our mission is to provide high-quality home massage services, helping clients relax and recover after stressful working days.

feedbacks.title: Customer Feedback
feedbacks.description: We always listen to customer feedback to improve our services.

testimonials.name: Nguyễn Văn A
testimonials.feedback: Great service, professional and friendly staff.

testimonials.name: Trần Thị B
testimonials.feedback: I was very satisfied with the basic massage package, felt more relaxed than ever.

testimonials.name: Lê Văn C
testimonials.feedback: The premium package was really worth it, I will come back again.
